subject: For New Startup : Textiles Innovation Challenge
body:
Sir,
Please forward the below mail to all students
Dear Students,
Greetings of the day!
Kind attention:  *The Textiles Innovation Challenge is open for Early
startups*
Textiles Innovation Challenge
The Ministry of Textiles in partnership with Startup India, Invest India,
and Atal Innovation Mission is launching- the ‘Textiles Innovation
Challenge with the following objectives –
1. Enable the generation of innovative and futuristic ideas
2. Catalyze innovation by identifying problem areas preventing the adoption
of unique products/services
3. Learn from industry experts and collaborate with them
For more details visit:
https://www.startupindia.gov.in/content/sih/en/ams-application/challenge.html?applicationId=65da0ef2e4b06352cbeffed3

subject: ICDR 2024 | Contest with exciting prizes
body:

[2]

Regards

subject: National Level Project Competition-2024 on 13th April 2024.
body:
Interested students can participate
Dear Sir/Madam,
Greetings from Bangalore Institute of Technology
It is our pleasure to inform you that the Department of Computer Science
and Engineering, BIT is organizing an National Level Project
Competition-2024 on 13th April 2024.
We are delighted to invite your students to participate in the Project
Competition. The Competition aims to showcase innovative ideas and
demonstrate the potential  in solving real-world challenges.
We truly appreciate your participation in the project competition and
celebrate outstanding achievements in the field of Computer science.
Thank you for your time, and we hope for a positive response soon.
*With Warm regards *
*Dr. Girija Jagannath*
*ProfessorDept. of Computer Science & EngineeringBangalore Institute of
Technology*
On Thu, Mar 14, 2024 at 3:25 PM maya BS <mayabs@bit-bangalore.edu.in> wrote:
> Dear Sir/Madam,
>
> Greetings from Bangalore Institute of Technology
>
> It is our pleasure to inform you that the Department of Computer Science
> and Engineering, BIT is organizing an National Level Project
> Competition-2024 on 13th April 2024.
>
> We are delighted to extend an invitation to participate your college
> students in the competition. The Competition aims to showcase innovative
> projects that demonstrate the potential of projects in solving real-world
> challenges
>
> We truly appreciate your consideration of this invitation and look forward
> to the possibility of participate in the competition and celebrate
> outstanding achievements in the field of Computer science.
>
> Thank you for your time, and we hope to receive your positive response
> soon.
>
> Best regards,
>
> Dr.Grija J
>
> Professor&HOD, CSE
>
> Bangalore Institute of Technology
>
> Bengaluru-04
>
>
>
Thanks & Regards,
*Dr. J. GirijaHOD, CSE*

subject: MahiAI club recruitment
body:
MahilAI is requesting for app and mail notifications for club recruitments.
The contents to be forward are attached with this mail.
Content:
🌟 Join MahilAI: Innovating for Safety with AI! 🚀🔍
Hello Innovators! ✨
Are you passionate about technology and committed to creating a safer world
for everyone? 🌍✨ MahilAI, our inclusive tech club, is on the lookout for
dynamic minds to join our mission of advancing women's safety through
cutting-edge AI processes. 🤖👩‍💻
We are not just a tech club; we're a community driving positive change.
MahilAI is dedicated to harnessing the power of artificial intelligence for
women's safety, and we welcome individuals of all genders who share our
vision. 🚀🔍
MahilAI at a Glance:🌍✨
Impact: Work on projects that make a difference.
Learn: Grow with access to workshops and mentorship from experts.
Network: Connect with like-minded individuals and professionals.
Diversity: Thrive in a truly inclusive environment.
🚀 Open Positions:
Research
Web Dev
Content
Logistics
Outreach
Design
Our community is diverse, dynamic, and ready to welcome fresh perspectives
and expertise! 🌍✊
To become a part of MahilAI, visit our instagram page for more details on
each position and how to apply! 🚀🔍
P.S. Content and Design are open for both RR and EC students, rest are only
for RR.
Don't miss this chance to be part of a community where technology meets
social impact!🌍✨
Link to register : https://forms.gle/GYrfigQguHXCed979

subject:
Graviton 2.0 - Hackathon message circulation. in CSE Department,
 Team Qforest
body:
Respected Mam,
We are QForest, the Quantum Computing Club at PES University. We are
excited to announce *GRAVITON 2.0, a 24-Hour Hackathon taking place on
April 6th and 7th, 2024.*
This event aims to provide an engaging platform for students to delve into
the principles and applications of quantum computing. We envision fostering
collaboration, innovation, and interdisciplinary learning within our
engineering community. Some key details for the same are:
Here is the message that we request to be shared with all students of CSE
Department : -
🌌🚀 Calling all Tech enthusiasts! 🚀🌌
Join us for the first hackathon of QForest : *Graviton 2.0 - Hackathon!!*
Get ready to quantum leap into the future!
*Date: April 6 and 7, 2024Venue : 13th Floor, BE Block, PES University,
Bangalore*
This isn't just any hackathon – it's a gravitational pull towards boundless
innovation. Are you ready to:
➡ Quantum leap into a superposition of possibilities: Tackle real-world
challenges with solutions that defy classical logic and harness the power
of entanglement.
➡ Form fermionic friendships: Collaborate with fellow quantum pioneers and
lay the groundwork for groundbreaking research.
➡ Elevate your career to new heights: Seize stellar prizes and propel
yourself into the quantum spotlight, reaching scientific singularity.
➡ Connect with quantum luminaries: Network with industry leaders and
navigate the quantum landscape towards the forefront of knowledge.
➡ Sponsored Honeywell Aerospace's problem statements
➡ Win exciting cash prizes and rewards
Save the date, fire up your quantum processors, and brace yourselves for a
journey beyond imagination! We'll be unveiling quantum updates as
intricately entangled as the particles themselves, so stay tuned!
🔗 Registration link :
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSde6WqXNx-LNA3biNnxDZnQEkGvLUoHOakjA45czVj7FKI3qA/viewform?usp=sf_link
*Deadline to register : April 2nd, 2024 , 11:59PM*
📧 Email us at qforest@pes.edu for any queries:
PFA of the poster
We would be grateful if you could circulate this message and share it with
all the CSE students.
Thank you for considering our request.
Warm regards,
QForest

subject: Holi 2024 Circular
body:
Fwd to all student groups
Dear Sir/Madam,
Greetings for the day.
This is to inform that on account of Holi on Monday March 25, 2024 all the
students are hereby informed to strictly adhere to the rules and guidelines
of the University.  Circular is attached in this regard.
Deans and Chairpersons are hereby requested to bring this information to
the notice of students.
Thanking you,
With regards,
Mamatha.N
Manager - Admin.
PES University
Bangalore

subject: Invitation to Dance Odyssey- Intra-College Dance Competition
body:
Dear Sir / Madam,
Requesting all the Deans / Chairpersons to send this to all students in
your Department(s).
This is to invite all dance groups in your departments to participate in
this event.
This is to shortlist the groups which will finally be allowed to perform
for the Students' Culnite on March 29, 2024 at The Big Auditorium (1600
capacity), GJBC during Aatmatrisha ' 24.
Warm Regards,
Dr. V. KRISHNA
*Dean, Student Affairs*
*Professor*, Department of Mechanical Engineering
*Head*, *P*rocess* M*odelling* R*esearch* Lab*oratory* (PMR Lab)*
*PES University, **Bangalore - 560085*
Mobile: *+91 82778 91600 *
*www.pes.edu <http://www.pes.edu/>*
* <http://drvkrishna.in/>*
Dear Sir/Madam,
In anticipation of the much-awaited Aatmatrisha, our annual techno-cultural
fest, we are excited to host *Dance Odyssey,* an intra-college dance
competition. This event serves as a prelude to the festivities of
Aatmatrisha. It aims to provide a platform for the cultural teams of PES
University to showcase their talent and creativity in the realm of dance.
We cordially invite all the dance teams of your department to participate
in this competition. It promises to celebrate dance, music, and artistic
expression, bringing together students from diverse backgrounds and
disciplines to share their passion for dance with the entire PES community.
*Details of the event:- Date: 25th March 2024- Time: 4:00 pm onwards-
Venue: MRD Auditorium (RR Nagar Campus)*
*To register, please fill out the form below:*
*https://forms.gle/6kAvWbUMGr6epvHR6* <https://forms.gle/6kAvWbUMGr6epvHR6>
The *winner* of the competition will perform at the prestigious *Cul Nite*
happening on the *29th of March.*
We believe that events like these not only serve as avenues for showcasing
talent but also foster a sense of unity and camaraderie among the cultural
clubs of our esteemed university.
We kindly request all the dance clubs at PES University to register and
participate in the event.
Warm regards,
Team Aatmatrisha
[image: Facebook] <https://www.facebook.com/ATPESU/>
[image: Instagram] <https://www.instagram.com/aatmatrisha_/>
[image: RSS] <http://aatmatrisha@pes.edu>
*Copyright © PES University*
*Our mailing address is:*
aatmatrisha@pes.edu
